paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: The paper discusses BRCA2 mutations and their implications in breast cancer, specifically detailing one variant and its associated penetrance data.

patients.phenotype: normal breast tissues, no prior treatment

individual_records.phenotype_details: normal breast tissues, no prior treatment
individual_records.evidence_sentence: The DNA from BRCA2 mutation carrier had been subjected to Myriad MyRisk Single Site Analysis and reported to contain a deleterious mutation IVS18+2T>C mutation.

functional_data.summary: The variant is reported as deleterious but specific functional assays are not detailed in the paper.

variants.source_location: Establishment of Breast Epithelial Cell Lines from BRCA1 and BRCA2 Mutation Carriers, Oncogene Overexpression, and Animal Studies
variants.additional_notes: Only one variant was reported for BRCA2.
key_quotes: The DNA from BRCA2 mutation carrier had been subjected to Myriad MyRisk Single Site Analysis and reported to contain a deleterious mutation IVS18+2T>C mutation.

extraction_metadata.notes: Only one BRCA2 variant was reported in the paper.
